lead_paragraph: Britain’s new foreign secretary, known for past insults of President Obama, Hillary Clinton and others, said he would not apologize for such comments, which he said had been misconstrued.

headline.print_headline: Unapologetic Foreign Secretary Meets the Press
headline.main: An Unapologetic Boris Johnson, Diplomat, Meets the Press

snippet: Britain’s new foreign secretary, known for past insults of President Obama, Hillary Clinton and others, said he would not apologize for such comments, which he said had been misconstrued....
abstract: Britain's new foreign secretary Boris Johnson delivers first news conference alongside Sec of State John Kerry; comments defiantly that he will refuse to apologize for past insults to Pres Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton; also says Britain will become even more focused on global issues under new government.
